document_data.name: Shaundakul's Throne
document_data.mainbody: '''Shaundakul's Throne''' was a temple dedicated to [[Shaundakul]], the Rider of the Winds.
document_data.Location: The shrine was located within in [[Myth Drannor]] before the fall of the city.
document_data.Description: A pair of towers were linked by walls forming an enclosed courtyard. The large central building contained the altar and an undercroft where Shaundakul's clergy lived. The actual throne sat upon a raised dais and was exosed to the sky.
document_data.History: The ruins of the temple stood long after the fall of Myth Drannor. Shaundakul's [[avatar]] often stood guard over the ruins.
